result.markdown:
--- about: template: jolla id: about-block image: "img/lisc_team.jpeg" links: - icon: twitter text: Twitter href: https://twitter.com/Lisc_Inrae - icon: github text: Github href: https://github.com/Lisc_Inrae - icon: linkedin text: LinkedIn href: https://www.linkedin.com/in/Lisc_Inrae/ - icon: envelope text: Email href: "mailto:ur.lisc@inrae.fr" --- ::: {#about-block} ::: # Welcome to the LISC! bla bla .... mkgdpogdgjdog This is a Shinylive application embedded in a Quarto doc. ```{shinylive-python} #| standalone: true #| components: [editor, viewer] from shiny import * app_ui = ui.page_fluid( ui.input_slider("n", "N", 0, 100, 40), ui.output_text_verbatim("txt"), ) def server(input, output, session): @output @render.text def txt(): return f"The value of n*2 is {input.n() * 2}" app = App(app_ui, server) ``` ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(leaflet) leaflet() %>% #addTiles() %>% # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles addProviderTiles('Esri.WorldImagery') %>% setView(3.110742, 45.762643, zoom = 17) %>% addMarkers(lat=45.762643, lng=3.110742, popup="The lisc Home") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(sf) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Linking to GEOS 3.11.1, GDAL 3.6.2, PROJ 9.1.1; sf_use_s2() is TRUE ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} library(leaflet) library(leafpop) pnt = st_as_sf(data.frame(x = 3.110742, y = 45.762643),coords = c("x", "y"),crs = 4326) img = "http://bit.ly/1TVwRiR" leaflet() %>% addProviderTiles('Esri.WorldImagery') %>% setView(3.110742, 45.762643, zoom = 17) %>% addCircleMarkers(data = pnt, group = "pnt",color = "#bf111a") %>% addPopupImages(img, group = "pnt") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(DT) datatable(mtcars) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library("wordcloud2") wordcloud2(demoFreq) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} datatable(demoFreq) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: :::
